Sticky Footer
=============

JavaScript
----------

.. js:function:: Plugins.fn.stickyfooter(scrollarea)

   Sticks the footer to the bottom of the scroll area if the content of the scroll area
   is too small to fill the scroll area. The current element is the footer.

   Use "html" as ``scrollarea`` to use the main scroll area.

   :param string scrollarea: jQuery selector.

   :returns: An object providing enable and disable functions.
